review: It was an amazing experience for me at Dr. Riddhi‚Äôs clinic for my dental care. She was friendly, patient and answered all my queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently did my root canal, tooth extraction, filling, cleaning, etc etc.
Experience with Dr Riddhi has been excellent right from the diagnosis, treatment and follow ups. And more so, patiently explaining the underlying causes and suggesting appropriate treatment without going overboard.
Also, given the time i had with me as I was flying overseas, she accommodated on high priority as multiple sittings were required and also got the cap done on urgent basis with high precision.
I would highly recommend her and lastly from what I have observed at the clinic is that she is excellent with the kids as well making them feel more comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: So basically from past 2 days I was having a bad toothache and due to lockdown everything was shut but regardless my dentist(Riddhi) did my check up and gave me proper medication the prescription was given by my dentist which included all pre and post medication which I had to follow. I was given an emergency tablet if in case my pain was not bearable but fortunately that did not take place .So over all this dentist has helped me a lot in my terrible situation and made my teeth‚Äôs and gums all perfect in just few days. Yes the pain was gone !!!! And I was happy. All thanks to my dentist for giving me the best and quick treatment

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: She was very kind and soft spoken.she helped us in difficult time such a difficult time when we really needed a doctor .She guided us with medicines and supported us without any condition she just supported us with very kindly she heard about our problems n really we appreciate her.thanks for everything.
